CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( Anticipated_Run_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, Anticipated_Run_Date__c-7, 1, Anticipated_Run_Date__c-7, 2, Anticipated_Run_Date__c-7, 3, Anticipated_Run_Date__c-7, 4, Anticipated_Run_Date__c-7, 5,Anticipated_Run_Date__c-7, 6,Anticipated_Run_Date__c-5, Anticipated_Run_Date__c)
CustomField.label: Prior Wages Due Date
